name: EZvolve Foundation Classes
short_description: EZvolve Foundation Classes is a set of data types and utility classes for use with evolutionary algorithms. Currently implemented support for bit string encoding, populations, fitnesses, fitness functions, probabilities, and probability vectors.
summary: Data types and utility classes for use with evolutionary algorithms.
